dct_title_s: Coal map : Hoosierville T 12 N. R.6 W. Asherville
dct_description_sm: Caption title: East-west section through Hoosierville and Asherville. Relief shown by profile. Index map showing locations of coal fields around Hoosierville and Asherville located in Clay County, Indiana, 1 geological cross-section through the two cities, 18 stratigraphic columns with correlation lines. Plate XXXI. Detached from: The coal deposits of Indiana / George Hall Ashley. In Indiana Department of Geology and Natural Resources twenty-third annual report, 1898. Indianapolis : Wm. B. Burford, 1899. Page 592.
Imprint: [Indianapolis] : [Indiana Department of Geology and Natural Resources], [1899]
dct_publisher_sm: Indiana. Department of Geology and Natural Resources
